1.text: Choose white pants made of cotton.

3.text: Scrunch your pants up towards the waistband for a splatter effect.

4.text: Fold your pants accordion style for a spiral design.

5.text: Put rubber bands around the middle of your pants for a bullseye.

6.text: Attach rubber bands in random places to hold your design in place.

7.text: Put on rubber gloves and lay down plastic to protect your surface.

8.text: Mix up your dye in individual squirt bottles.

9.text: Squirt dye over your pants in a random pattern for an irregular design.

10.text: Add dye in blocks or lines for a sequential pattern.

11.text: Place your pants in a plastic bag and let them sit for 6 hours.

12.text: Rinse out your pants with cold water.

13.text: Let your pants air dry before you wear them.
